channel.title: !Sidebar/Interface configuration! And, Timers?
channel.description:
1. Anybody know how to configure certain parts of a sidebar/interface? (Ex: What the sidebar/interface says)
I know its something like sendquest, than what you want it to say, than the spots id number, but:
1. I dont know how correct this is
2. I don't which id numbers are for what interface/sidebar and for what spot.
Thx
(Oh, and PS, what does "sendquest" even mean or do?)
2. Anyone know how to at a "wait" function, like in SCAR scripts? For example, in my TuT about noclippers, I have made it so when someone uses noclip, it makes them say something embarresing. But, I can't make them say more then 1 thing, or it will only say the last line of phrase. I know this is kinda confusing so i'll show an example:
Without a "wait" function:
[code]pSay(I like fat men) pSay(Im just a noob, kill me) pSay(Im gay)[/code]
But all the player says is "Im gay" Because the computer tries to make him say it all at the same time, so, something like:
[code] pSay(I like fat men) wait(500) pSay(Im just a noob, kill me) wait(500) pSay(Im gay) [/code]
So he'll wait 1/2 a second between sayings.
Thx[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 11:17:36 AM[/size][hr]Oh, and how can I get my "sendQuest"s to work?

Send quest means when you do that certain thing it sends like a message or a screen or sumthing

item.title: !Sidebar/Interface configuration! And, Timers?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Anybody know how to configure certain parts of a sidebar/interface? (Ex: What the sidebar/interface says)

I know its something like sendquest, than what you want it to say, than the spots id number, but:

  1. I dont know how correct this is

  2. I don’t which id numbers are for what interface/sidebar and for what spot.

Thx

(Oh, and PS, what does “sendquest” even mean or do?)

Anyone know how to at a “wait” function, like in SCAR scripts? For example, in my TuT about noclippers, I have made it so when someone uses noclip, it makes them say something embarresing. But, I can’t make them say more then 1 thing, or it will only say the last line of phrase. I know this is kinda confusing so i’ll show an example:

Without a “wait” function:

pSay(I like fat men) pSay(Im just a noob, kill me) pSay(Im gay)

But all the player says is “Im gay” Because the computer tries to make him say it all at the same time, so, something like:

pSay(I like fat men)
wait(500)
pSay(Im just a noob, kill me)
wait(500)
pSay(Im gay)

So he’ll wait 1/2 a second between sayings.

Thx[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 11:17:36 AM[/size][hr]Oh, and how can I get my "sendQuest"s to work?

Read full topic
